title: Careers - Vox Media
content: Filed under: Welcome to Vox Media! We’re thrilled you’re considering working with us. You’ll be joining a friendly, fun, fast-paced, innovative, and inspiring community. Our team members come to Vox Media via diverse paths — we have backgrounds in painting, journalism, economics, English literature, sports marketing, advertising, photography, grassroots politics, blogging, soccer, and sketch comedy, just to name a few — and that’s on top of our design, software engineering, sales, video, and writing experience. What unites us is a shared passion for inquiry and excellence in our respective endeavors. We encourage you to be cautious of hiring scams that aim to take advantage of job seekers by impersonating the Vox Media recruiting team. Learn more here: Recruiting Scam Warning.  Apply to Vox Media for Future Openings
